Prime Day UK: All the hottest Amazon Prime day deals on Amazon devices

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Alia KheirMashable Deals2018-07-16 15:26:19 UTC

Historically Amazon Prime day is one of the best times to pick up a bargain on an Amazon device, and this year is no different. Right now you can save over 50% on Echo Show (only £99.99) and pick up some great deals Fire Tablets (starting at only £29.99), Fire TV and Kindle devices. Below is our handy round up of the best deals on Amazon devices so far.

SEE ALSO: Amazon Prime Day: Audible membership 50% off for 12 months


Fire Tablets

Fire 7 Tablet. Now £29.99, list price £49.99. 

Fire 7 Kids Edition Tablet. Now £59.99, list price £99.99. 

Fire HD 8 Tablet. Now £49.99, list price £79.99. 

Fire HD 8 Kids Edition Tablet. Now £89.99, list price £129.99. 

Fire HD 10 Tablet with Alexa Hands-Free. Now £99.99, list price £149.99.   


Kindle Devices

Kindle Oasis E-reader, Waterproof, 7" High-Resolution Display. Now £179.99, list price £229.99. 

Kindle Paperwhite E-reader, 6" High-Resolution Display. Now £74.99. list price £109.99.  


Fire TV

Fire TV with 4K Ultra HD and Alexa Voice Remote. Now £39.00, list price £69.99. 

Fire TV Stick. Now £24.99, list price £39.99.


Home Devices

Amazon Dash Button. Now £1.99, list price £4.99.

Echo Dot. Now £29.99, list price £49.99.

Blink Indoor Home Security Camera System. Now £79.00, list price £129.99. 

Blink XT Home Security 3 x Camera System. Now £229.99, list price £329.99.

Bundle: Echo Show + Ring Video Doorbell Pro. Now £239.99, list price £438.99. 

Bundle: Echo Spot + Ring Video Doorbell 2. Now £199.99, list price £298.99. 

Bundle: Ring Video Doorbell 2 + Chime. Now £149.00, list price £208.00.  

Amazon Echo (2nd Generation), Eufy Lumos Wi-Fi Smart Bulb (no Hub required). Now £69.99, list price £119.98. 

Amazon Echo Dot (2nd Generation), Eufy Lumos Wi-Fi Smart Bulb (no Hub required). Now £39.99, list price £79.98.  

Amazon Echo Spot, Eufy Lumos Wi-Fi Smart Bulb (no Hub required). Now £119.99, list price £179.98

Echo Show. Now £99.99, list price £199.99. 

Amazon Echo (2nd generation), smart speaker with Alexa. Now £59.99, list price £89.99. 

Ring Spotlight Cam Battery, HD Security Camera with LED Spotlight. Now £139.00, list price £199.00

Ring Spotlight Cam Wired. Now £139.00, list price £199.00. 

Ring Video Doorbell 2. Now £124.99, list price £179.00.  

Ring Video Doorbell Pro. Now £149.00, list price £239.00. 

Echo Spot. Now £89.99, list price £119.99.
